website_summaries.verdict: The best value for your money. You won't find as effective of a hand cream at this price point.
pros: Thick, moisturizing cream at a very affordable price
Incredibly hydrating results for dry skin
cons: Some owners find it to be greasy, but we didn't think so

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this because my customer right now is a doctor and he recomended it to me. This is my first time using it and I can say it feels real good. Not greasy and absorbed into my dry skin well. Doesnt realy have an odor or at least I dont notice one. So far its literally just what the doctor ordered lol. Hands feel ok and not all dry and itchy so I day thumbs up for being worth a shot
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description- for body NOT face or face/ body - skin reacted
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was strange the picture that was used for the item & that there was only one. But I checked title and thought I had what I had always used (face and body). I should have read other reviews, this is for BODY and if you have sensitive skin you may have redness and a reaction as I and others did. I was so confused after only two uses until I read a few other reviews. May work for body but I’m not changing it due to skin reaction. And seems sketchy to me that the only picture of item doesn’t have the front. Maybe it’s a fake not sure but buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: MTwp

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy, not too thick or thin, pleasant scent and deeply moisturizes- now I see why this product has been around for so long! Not just for old ladies! This is the real deal! Great on face and body! Sinks right in and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: B3loyalist

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: with age comes great responsibility. ?!? say What? So if you want to slow down or reverse the wrinkling process then you will want to use a moisturizer like this one. It has no odor and has done wonders for my skin. There may be better ones but the market is quite full of competitors with wild claims. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: peter Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Must have for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn. I had read this would help with baby acne and it did wonders! It went away so fast and I actually started using it for cradle cap and it went away overnight. My baby loves when I run this on her cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin McAninch

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my wife, she loves it !
customer_reviews.text: it's great for sensitive skin, and fragrance is lovely. It's very hydrating and better than other brands she tried off the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Family

customer_reviews.title: Heels red skin in a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: I love it for some things it works really well other things might need something else it takes right away on your skin on the dogs skin takes away irritation.
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Great mostiorizer.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, my daughter had severe eczema and this cream helped keep her skin clear after a treatment with a steroid cream, we apply twice daily.
customer_reviews.author: Happy cat

customer_reviews.title: Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream, Fragrance Free, 8.8 Ounce
customer_reviews.text: This a lovely cream that has NO SCENT!. It is wonderful for those of us with skin sensitivities. Lovely mouisterizer!
customer_reviews.author: spirits&angels

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY A GOOD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I would RECOMMEND this to anyone who has dry and sensitive skin like myself! Since using this, my skin hasn’t been dry & I love that it doesn’t have a scent because scenty things make my skin breakout! I use this so many times a day!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good fragrance free cream.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the facial cleanser for years. Just tried this moisturizer and as advertised. Smooth, not greasy, absolutely no fragrance which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Hard2Please

customer_reviews.title: Whole family uses it.
customer_reviews.text: It's very moisturizing. The whole family uses it. Doesn't have a scent that I've noticed. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Grainger

customer_reviews.title: great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, thick, evening moisturizer. I love it
customer_reviews.author: kkandkk

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Seems to penetrate and emolliate (smooth and soften) well. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A

customer_reviews.title: Greaseless!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry skin from a condition called Sjogren's Syndrome and my dermatologist suggested this cream. I love it! I use it every day after I shower and again at night before bed. It doesn't leave a greasy feeling but leaves my skin soft and itch free!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Agar

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: My skin is crazy dry plus I live in a dry place. This lotion is amazing. I use it on my face as well and have not had any problems with break outs. It's thick, but it blends in easily
customer_reviews.author: Grace Protzman

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! I it doesn't leave a greasy residue and it soaks in pretty quick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Receive the wrong item twice!
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is not the same as the ad. The picture of the ad is "Dry", but the one I received is "Very dry". I othered twice and both of them were wrong. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sien Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: been using this product for years. Love this size container. Usually buy from Costco
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Curtis

customer_reviews.title: My skin thanks you
customer_reviews.text: My skin has been dry because of the winter and with one use my skin got a glow up, I’m in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaene Canales

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love it and my dermatologist and pharmacist approved of my choice!
customer_reviews.author: Townedge

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dry Skim
customer_reviews.text: Non-scented which I love and the only thing that will keep me moisturized overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Valela

customer_reviews.title: Use everyday and skin is soft
customer_reviews.text: Use this every single day. Cetaphil is the absolute best for your skin!
customer_reviews.author: Kylene68

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Eczema kid.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has eczema, and her skin is very sensitive. This is the only product that she is okay with, also helps her skin keep moisture. Love Cetaphil moisturizing cream.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Chao

customer_reviews.title: Nice product; I am  happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Used for eczema for elbows. In addition to steroid cream. It’s a nice product. Not as thick as I imagined it would be which is great. Also using for arms and legs. No smell.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: If you have really dry skin like me, you will find that this Cetaphil cream ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have really dry skin like me, you will find that this Cetaphil cream really moisturizes your skin and does not leave it sticky or greasy..It solks right in.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cetaphil was recommended by a dermatologist and I have used it for years. The smaller size is appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like somebody dipped their fingers in it
customer_reviews.text: Product seal was broken when I received it. Looks like somebody dipped their fingers in it. Literally a 1/3 of the jar was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Because I ordered the Cetaphil pots with Blue cover as ...
customer_reviews.text: Because I ordered the Cetaphil pots with Blue cover as shown in the picture and I got pots with a Green Cover ! and the product arrived to me (open).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff!!! I think it is easier to use than the lotion, not sticky when you use just a little, & doesn't irritate my super sensitive, dry skin. I was surprised that it actually felt so much lighter than the lotion, though that might be because it is easier to use less of the cream in the tub style container. On a whimsical note, I like the low profile container, with the apple green lid.... I don't mind it sitting out, so I use it more often. Nice!👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Jen Williams

customer_reviews.title: I like cetaphil cream. But did not like how it arrived at my home.
customer_reviews.text: I like cetaphil moisturizing cream it helps for my dried skin, cuts, sensitive skin too. Very good product. Item as described by the seller. But packaged arrived with minor damages for first time and seemed to already been opened and not organized inside the box, and it got retaped on the box with Amazon tape and label shipping. Amazon needs to fix the shipping box. But overall fair shipping and product is good.
customer_reviews.author: xArkSlade08x

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by doctor. I have extremely dry skin. This has reversed all the damage. It took less than a week to have noticeable change in my skin. A little goes along way. There's no perfumie smell, so as a guy I appreciate not smelling like 💐.
customer_reviews.author: DrkKnight

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Skip the lotions....this cream is THE ABSOLUTE BEST moisturizer. I've been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: legs--and it is wonderful! It was originally recommended to me by dermatologist ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years--on my face, arms, feet, legs--and it is wonderful! It was originally recommended to me by dermatologist for a bad rash on my hands probably caused by contact with some harsh detergent. Cleared it up almost overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Len R.

customer_reviews.title: The only lotion I will buy from now on.
customer_reviews.text: You don't know moisture until you try this stuff. I have DRY skin and this stuff soaks into my skin without leaving me feeling oily. Absolutely recommend this product! You may think at first the amount you get is smallish, but you don't need much of this stuff and it's a substantial amount!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have had difficulty finding new moisturizer for dry skin that works since I moved to Florida. This product is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: It arrived unsealed and looked like it had been used. I'm scared to use it.
customer_reviews.author: H. hamel

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than Cerave
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than Cerave (in the tub), as thick as Cerave for Rough and Bumpy Skin but without the SA that causes sun sensitivity. Melts into skin.
customer_reviews.author: W. W. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great crem just too greasy for me
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just a little too greasy for my skin. Buy for someone with dry skin
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: This product meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and this product really works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: bell

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size because the regular huge cetaphil jars always get dried out and from repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing so I use it sparingly. I like it on my arms and hands too.
customer_reviews.author: Newman

product_meta.title: Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream, Fragrance Free, 8.8 Ounce
product_meta.description: Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream contains a superior system of extra-strength emollients and humectants clinically proven to bind water to the skin and prevent moisture loss. The result is long-lasting relief for even severely dry skin. The non-greasy formula is excellent for hands, feet, elbows, knees, and any other areas that require intensive moisturization.
feature_bullets: Clinically proven to provide immediate, long lasting hydration that soothes dry, itchy skin
Unique formula attracts water to the skin and helps prevent moisture loss
Intense and lasting moisture to replenish sensitive, dry skin great for eczema and very dry skin

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
